name: ハッピーパパサポート！～Sugar Daddy Support～
name_original: ハッピーパパサポート！～Sugar Daddy Support～
description:
～Sugar Daddy Support～ハッピーパパサポート！ is a novel game in which Keiichi, a well-to-do office worker develops a relationship with multiple girls looking for a sugar daddy. Over time, their relationship develops from transactionary to romantic.
A Bishojo Game released in 2017 under the "Noirsoft" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Introduction
What was I even living for?
There was a void inside of me that hungered for something, anything.
They clearly had ulterior motives for approaching me, but it would all be worth it if they could satiate this emptiness inside me.


◆Synopsis
Keiichi has a great job and makes a lot of money, but his life is meaningless.
Until one day, a girl in the park calls out to him...

"Hey mister, looking for something to do?"

Not again, Keiichi thinks to himself. It wasn't the first time he'd been approached like this.
Despite his protests, she grabs Keiichi by the arm and half-drags him on a date.

After that fateful encounter, Keiichi meets and romances several other girls and starts to realize that his life isn't so empty anymore.
Over time, they've managed to carve out a place in his heart.

And as they spend more time together, love blossoms between them...


◆Characters
・Ayaka Kawarada
"Hey mister, looking for something to do?"
A girl with a bright and cheery personality, but grounded in reality.
She has her own reasons to ask Keiichi out on a date.
In truth, she can be fairly naive and keeps even her friends at a distance.

・Kanako Izumi
"Hey hey, it's Kanako here as requested!"
An energetic and friendly girl with no concept of personal space.
Keiichi's met with her several times but she's yet to return his affections.
She seems to know a lot about people in her line of business.

・Hana Kariya
"...I can't do this, I'm going home..."
An honor student with little experience in regards to romance.
Kanako brought her to meet Keiichi, but she ran away before anything happened.
Her family is poor and she'd do anything to keep them off the streets.

・Mari Shiratori
"You should choose someone, and soon."
Inscrutable and mysterious, she's the first girl Keiichi meets.
Every once in a while she'll say something that implies that she knows more than she lets on.


・Keiichi Suou
The protagonist, a 30-something who works at a large conglomerate.
He describes himself as the living dead, as for all of the money he earns, he has no passions or hobbies.
Unable to find meaning in life, he's even begun to feel irritation towards the small fortune he's amassed.
